page.title: 12MY SCHOOL CONT'D
page.content: We have lunch at l2.lO and we either stay to school lunch or have sandwiches. No-one goes home to lunch as there are always many activities to take part in, such as athletics,swimming, rounders, cricket,and in the winter there are clubs for chess, stamps,scrabble, and computers. We have an outdoor swimming pool, an athletics track,and high- and long-jump pits. We have two form captains in each class for whom everyone in the class votes. They have to do various jobs for the teachers and are worked very hard! We have three Houses, Kings, Queens and Trinity, and we have housepoints for good work and behaviour.
